Question
========

waarnemingen?
  
Answerlist
----------
* (i) 2.71 en (ii) 2.92
* (i) 2.71 en (ii) 3.32
* (i) 2.95 en (ii) 2.92
* (i) 2.95 en (ii) 3.32

Solution
========

Answerlist

* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
